uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.ratelimit.RateLimiter

  • Packages that use RateLimiter 
    Package Description
    uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient  
    uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.ratelimit  

    • Uses of RateLimiter in uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient

      Methods in uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient with parameters of type RateLimiter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BrightpearlApiClientFactory.setRateLimiter(RateLimiter rateLimiter)
      Set the RateLimiter implementation to be used for monitoring and limiting request throughput.
      BrightpearlApiClientFactory BrightpearlApiClientFactory.withRateLimiter(RateLimiter rateLimiter)
      Set the RateLimiter implementation to be used for monitoring and limiting request throughput.

    • Uses of RateLimiter in uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.ratelimit

      Classes in uk.co.visalia.brightpearl.apiclient.ratelimit that implement RateLimiter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstantWaitRateLimiter
      A very basic implementation of RateLimiter that will reduce the throughput of requests by pausing for the minimum period required to ensure the cap is not exceeded.
      class  NoOpRateLimiter
      An implementation of RateLimiter that allows requests to be sent to Brightpearl as fast as they are made by the client.
